channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WI

item.title: Report E-2025020251
item.description:
Report E-2025020251

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-23T00:59:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-20
  • City: HUDSON
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: KAG Energy, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 6540
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The KAG Energy, LLC driver was attempting to drain the residual diesel fuel from the delivery hose after completing his delivery. Approximately 10 gallons of diesel fuel was released. Enivroserve responded to the scene and handled the remediation.
